review: I love the idea of the chromecast, but must admit I had some problems at first. Once it is setup, it works pretty well. It's great to stream from Netflix or YouTube on your iphone. The only time I really have problems with it is when I move it somewhere and have to set it up again, sometimes it can be a bit finicky.

review: Works really well for most things like casting directly on tv. I've been using it to cast NFL Game Pass on my TV and it has worked perfectly without any hitches as well as using it to watch tv shows from Plex.However if you are playing a video on your laptop and cast that to your tv it just keeps showing still screens every 2 seconds with audio running fine. I should note this feature (casting entire screen) is still experimental. Hopefully the kinks will be ironed out soon.
